title: I Work at the Stables
subtle: Personal Narrative (nonfiction), 72 words, Level E (Grade 1), Lexile 190L
description: Aria works at a stable where she takes care of Duke, her horse. I Work at the Stables provides students an inside look into the tasks that are required to care for a horse. The book can also be used to teach students how to determine main idea and details and to recognize and use capitalization correctly.
meta: coat, hoof, stable, stall, stretch, watch
Connect to prior knowledge to understand text
Main Idea and Details : Determine main idea and details
VCe Pattern : Identify words with a VCe pattern
Capitalization : Recognize and use capitalization correctly
High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency words me, play, work

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
